original_title: Looney Tunes Super Stars Foghorn Leghorn & Friends: Barnyard Bigmouth
overview: A collection of classic Warner Brothers cartoons. With favorite characters like Foghorn Leghorn, Elmer Fudd, Goofy Gophers, Mexicali crows and other barnyard friends, this collection is sure to bring back memories.
title: Looney Tunes Super Stars Foghorn Leghorn & Friends: Barnyard Bigmouth
